message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.CY 

This paper deals with privacy concerns in smart metering systems, which is a topic closely related to computer security (cs.CR). The paper also uses information theory (cs.IT) to study the privacy metric and optimal battery charging policies. The optimization problem is ultimately recast as a Markov decision process, which falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY). The paper also proposes a series of reductions on the optimization problem, which involves mathematical analysis and optimization techniques, falling under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and cybernetics (cs.CY).
